Password.message: The password you have entered is invalid.

description.message: Keeps you safe when browsing the web by identifying and blocking dangerous websites.

serverUnAvailable.message: Rating temporarily unavailable.  We are working to restore service. No user action is necessary

toolTip_1_A.message: This website falls into the category

toolTip_2_A.message: is a high probability that you will be exposed to malicious links or payloads

toolTip_2_B.message: is a higher than average probability that you will be exposed to malicious links or payloads

toolTip_2_D.message: is a low probability that you will be exposed to malicious links or payloads

toolTip_2_E.message: is a very low probability that you will be exposed to malicious links or payloads

TEXT_RISK.message: This site contains malware or other security risks.

TEXT_SUSPICIOUS.message: This site may contain content that could affect your online security.

DESCRIPTION_TEXT_48.message:
This add-on is compatible with Firefox 48 or greater. 
If this add-on is disabled then you are using a version of Firefox 47 or lower, please check the add-on list for an enabled version of the add-on compatible with your Firefox installation. If you do not see an enabled version of the add-on please contact Webroot support for further assistance.

TEXT_BA_ERROR.message: Ratings are temporarily unavailable or the Webroot agent is shutdown. Wait for service to be restored or check to be sure the Webroot agent is running.

SRA_ERROR_TXT.message: Ratings are temporarily unavailable or the Webroot agent is shutdown. Wait for service to be restored or check to be sure the Webroot agent is running.

BA_ERROR_TXT.message: Ratings are temporarily unavailable. Wait for service to be restored or find more information here.

BA_ERROR_TXT_COMPONENT.message: Web Threat Shield cannot reach one of its components. Consider restart or reinstall.

BA_MAC_TXT.message: This extension is available to Webroot SecureAnywhere subscribers on PC only. Make sure to install the right version for your operating system, please find more information here.

BA_PC_TXT.message: This extension is available to Webroot SecureAnywhere subscribers on MacOS only. Make sure to install the right version for your operating system, please find more information here.

BA_UNKNOWNOS_TXT.message: This extension is available to Webroot SecureAnywhere subscribers on PC only. Your operating system is currently not supported, please find more information here.

BA_WSAERROR_TXT.message: This extension requires Webroot SecureAnywhere PC to be installed and running, please find more information here.

OPTIONS_INTEGRATED_MODE.message: Web Threat Shield extension settings are managed by Webroot SecureAnywhere.

OPTIONS_INTEGRATED_MODE_DETAILS.message: Settings for the Web Threat Shield extension are applied in the installed Webroot SecureAnywhere agent for home users, or by policy in the management console for business users. The current settings are shown below.

OPTIONS_INTEGRATED_SEARCHANNOTATION.message: Show safety ratings when using search engines

OPTIONS_INTEGRATED_REFRESHNOTE.message: Changes made in the SecureAnywhere agent will be reflected here after browsing to a new page in another tab.

OPTIONS_STANDALONE_EULATEXT.message:
To activate this extension, please enter your Webroot SecureAnywhere keycode below.
By clicking "Validate keycode" you hereby agree to the Webroot SecureAnywhere
Solution Agreement available here and the Webroot SecureAnywhere Privacy Statement
available here.

OPTIONS_KEYCODE_VALIDATOR_SUCCESS.message: This keycode is valid and your product is running. No further action is necessary.

OPTIONS_PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION1.message: Webroot Web Threat Shield Extension for Mozilla Firefox requires your permission to gather information about the webpages you visit (URLs and IP addresses). This is required for our database servers to check the webpage and detect malware. Without this permission the extension will not be able to detect any potentially malicious sites.

OPTIONS_PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION2.message: By clicking Allow and installing the extension, you agree to forward the visited or searched URL information to Webroot servers to compare URLs in the malware databases.

OPTIONS_PRIVACY_DESCRIPTION3.message: For more information about what data we are collecting and how we are protecting it, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

OPTIONS_PRIVACY_DECLINE_TEXT1.message: Unfortunately, without your permission to gather the necessary URL information, Web Threat Shield cannot function as intended.

OPTIONS_PRIVACY_DECLINE_TEXT2.message: Unless you wish to reconsider the permission to gather this information, we recommend you to remove and uninstall the extension.

BA_KEYCODE_FEATURE_1.message: Browser Annotations - These show the reputation of the site you are currently visiting.

BA_KEYCODE_FEATURE_2.message: Search Annotations - These show the reputation of pages in your browser search results, so you know which sites results are safe to click.

BA_KEYCODE_FEATURE_3.message: Real-time Protection from Malicious Sites - We’ll automatically block malicious sites for you to make sure you stay safe online.

BA_KEYCODE_WARNING_TEXT_2.message: Your license for Webroot SecureAnywhere is expiring. This will affect your Web Threat Shield extensions. Renew your license today to continue browsing the web securely!
